extendedInfo.description: The white tiger is a recessive mutant of the Bengal tiger, which was reported in the wild from time to time in Assam, Bengal, Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa. Compared to normal colored tigers without the white gene, white tigers tend to be some what smaller than original tigers, both at birth and as fully grown adults. There are majestic to look at and makes wonderful Live Wallpaper. Here are 3D Cube version of Live Wallpaper. Features Include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.

reviews.title: White tiger
reviews.comment: The white tiger have blue eyes
